Useful files for retro games

Here are useful files for old games to make them run better on modern systems, mostly hd fixes.

Retro Game Patches

  • Emperor — Rise of the Middle Kingdom (2002)

    • HD Resolution & Widescreen Fix
      Main MEGA
      Enhances graphics for modern displays

  • Zeus & Poseidon (2000)

    • HD Resolution & Widescreen Fix
      Main MEGA
      Fix for many widescreen resolutions

  • Pharaoh & Cleopatra (1998)

    • HD Resolution & Widescreen Fix
      Main MEGA
      Fix for many widescreen reslutions

  • Arcanum (2000)

    • Unofficial Arcanum Patch
      Main MEGA
      Bugfixes, new features, new races, enhances graphics for modern displays, high resolution and font size fixes
    • Arcanum Factory
      Main MEGA
      Let's you modify the game files, like putting more stuff into vendors etc.
